Title: AIDS - I care, do you?
Publisher: Disease Control Department of the Ministry of Public Health (卫生部疾病控制司), China Health Education Research Institute (中国健康教育研究所) Beijing
Notes: Long title:Prevent AIDS - You and I, let us participate together; Equality - Care - Let life be full of sunshine Yufang aizibing - Niwo tong canyu (预防艾滋病 - 你我同参与; 平等 - 关爱 - 让生命充满阳光)The man is Pu Cunxin (濮存昕), famous actor and goodwill ambassador in China's campaign against HIV/AIDS.Original idea for the poster design by Beijing New Century Advertising Ltd./Fang Xiaojie; Photograph taken by Feng Qingang.
